name: Auto Updating
summary: Updates can be installed in the app, and lorebook management and creation was improved.

new_features.title: Updater
new_features.description: LocalChatting now comes bundled with an updater, allowing automatic updates, downloading updates from the app. Still in testing, expect some issues.

new_features.title: Lorebook Tab
new_features.description: Lorebooks were given a sidebar tab, allowing global lorebooks, which you can select to apply to chats without importing them constantly. Old lorebooks are turned into temporary lorebooks now.

new_features.title: Lorebook Editor
new_features.description: Accompanying the lorebook tab, is the new lorebook editor, similar to the character editor. Lorebook creation is way less finnicky now.

new_features.title: Update log/Blog notifications and caching
new_features.description: When a new blog or update log is released, there's an icon shown. Update logs and blogs are also cached, making them load faster and be visible offline.

improvements.title: Themes
improvements.description: Theme selection was broken last update, and custom themes applied immediately without saving settings. Both issues are fixed.
